name: hexi puff coaster
notes:
*[get this pattern free on tlycblog.com][1]*

add a pop of color to your home when you make the hexi puff coasters. these fun and fast coasters use are worked from the center out in individual motifs using the classic puff stitch. a single crochet border and loop are added so you can display your project proudly in the kitchen or dining room. 

pattern highlights

// the hexi puff coasters are fun, fast, and easy. bet you can't make just one!
// this pattern includes a full tutorial video that takes you step-by-step through making the hexi puff coasters, including the yarn and colors i used, creating the motif, and adding the border + hanging loop.
// any dk weight yarn will do! trying with worsted? go up to a 5.5mm or 6mm crochet hook. 

available sizes:
one size - 6.5” from one point, across the center to the next point. add more rounds to make your coasters larger. 

suggested yarn:
knitpicks/ wecrochet cotlin, or any comparable dk weight yarn.

hooks used:
5mm crochet hook

notions used:
-scissors
-tapestry needle
